common_2100_head_teacher_01: Excellent. It seems everyone is here.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_02:
Some of you will certainly have heard the
happy news.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_03a:
We have a new Champion here at Naranja
Academy![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_03b: We have a new Champion here at Uva Academy![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Yes, none other than our very own M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_05:
It gives me great joy to see one of our students
achieve this feat during their time at the academy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_06:
Today’s tournament was organized by your
student council president, Miss Nemona, in\r
celebration of her friend’s accomplishment.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_07:
I invite all of you here to see for yourselves the
impressive strength of our new Champion.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_08:
Not to mention the talents of those students
claiming the spotlight for the first time today...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_09:
And, of course, the superb battle prowess and
acumen of our esteemed faculty.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2100_head_teacher_10:
Now, without further ado, let the Academy Ace
Tournament—our School Battle Brawl—begin![VAR 0114(000A)]
